channel.title: CVE Feed for WPCoder -- WP Coder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPCoder -- WP Coder

item.title: CVE-2024-2578|2024-06-07T18:38:27.903Z -- wpcoder -- wp%20coder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPCoder WP Coder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Coder: from n/a through 3.5.
